metadata.title: CVE-2018-13301 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
In FFmpeg 4.0.1, due to a missing check of a profile value before settingit, the ff_mpeg4_decode_picture_header function inlibavcodec/mpeg4videodec.c may trigger a NULL pointer dereference whileconverting a crafted AVI file to MPEG4, leading to a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13301` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.0.2-2
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.0.2-2
libavcodec-extra60 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavcodec60 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavdevice60 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.0.2-2
libavfilter-extra9 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavfilter9 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavformat-extra - 7:4.0.2-2
libavformat-extra60 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavformat60 - 7:4.0.2-2
libavutil58 - 7:4.0.2-2
libpostproc57 - 7:4.0.2-2
libswresample4 - 7:4.0.2-2
libswscale7 - 7:4.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
ffmpeg package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.0.2-2').
mythtv package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
